%BOON%.name: Boon
%BOON%.description: Temporarily makes an element, be that minion or player, more powerful.

%BULWARK%.name: Guard
%BULWARK%.description: A minion ability which forces the opposing player to direct any melee attacks toward enemy targets with this ability.

%BUBBLE%.name: Energy Shield
%BUBBLE%.description: Absorbs the first source of any damage, removing the shield.

%HIDDEN%.name: Concealed
%HIDDEN%.description: May not be the target of enemy attacks, spells, or abilities until they attack or deal damage. Once they attack or deal damage, the ability is removed. Minions with this ability can still be affected by AoE spells.

%SILENCE%.name: Suppress
%SILENCE%.description: Removes all card text, enchantments, and abilities from the target minion, except for auras provided by external cards in play.

%SPELL_DAMAGE%.name: Spell Damage
%SPELL_DAMAGE%.description: Increases the output of your damaging spells.

%OVERLOAD%.name: Exhaust
%OVERLOAD%.description: You have {X} less mana next turn. This effect is activated when the card is played from the hand, and typically allows a powerful card to be played for a low mana cost this round, at the price of reduced mana next turn.

%DOUBLE_ATTACK%.name: Onslaught
%DOUBLE_ATTACK%.description: An ability which allows a character to attack twice per turn.

%RUSH%.name: Stampede
%RUSH%.description: Enables the minion to attack on the same turn that it is summoned.

%ARMOR%.name: Energy Shield
%ARMOR%.description: A form of secondary Health available only to players.

%COMBO%.name: Combo
%COMBO%.description: Triggers an effect when played from the hand if you already played another card this turn.

%LIFESTEAL%.name: Lifesteal
%LIFESTEAL%.description: Damage dealt by the card also restores Health to the controlling hero. It is identified by a broken purple heart that appears at the bottom of the minion's portrait.

%ON_DEATH%.name: Curse
%ON_DEATH%.description: A triggered effect which activates when the minion dies. It is identified by a skull and crossbones that appears at the bottom of the minion's portrait.

%IMMUNE%.name: Immune
%IMMUNE%.description: Prevents damage dealt from any source to the target, and prevents all enemy interaction with the target.

%BUFF%.name: Buff
%BUFF%.description: Permanently makes an element, be that minion or player, more powerful.

%SET_VALUE%.name: Set Value
%SET_VALUE%.description: Assigns a new value for something's Attack, Health, or Cost, or Durability.

%DISCOVER%.name: Acquire
%DISCOVER%.description: Choose one card from three random class-appropriate cards.

%POISON%.name: Poisonous
%POISON%.description: Any minion damaged with this ability minion is destroyed.

%MYSTERY%.name: Mystery
%MYSTERY%.description: A type of spell card that remains hidden until its trigger condition occurs, revealing it, and triggering its effect. Can only be activated during the opponent's turn, but some exceptions activate at the start of the player's next turn. Only one can be in play for a given player at a time.

%ENERGY%.name: Energy
%ENERGY%.description: The primary resource used to play cards and activate class skills.

%SUMMON%.name: Summon
%SUMMON%.description: Summons the specified minion/s. Distinct from simply playing a minion card from the hand, this is an ability found on spell or minion cards.

%DEBUFF%.name: Debuff
%DEBUFF%.description: Permanently makes an element, be that minion or player, less powerful.

%STEAL%.name: Steal
%STEAL%.description: Transfers ownership of the targeted minion.

%DRAW_CARD%.name: Draw Card
%DRAW_CARD%.description: Causes the player to draw one or more cards from their deck.

%EXPIRATION%.name: Expiration
%EXPIRATION%.description: Destroys a target at the start of your next turn.

%TRANSFORM%.name: Transform
%TRANSFORM%.description: Changes a minion into something else irreversibly, entirely replacing the previous card.

%DESTROY%.name: Vanquish
%DESTROY%.description: Destroys a target without dealing damage to it.

%CANT_TARGET%.name: No Target
%CANT_TARGET%.description: Gives minions an ability that renders them unable to be targeted by spells or Class Skills.

%CHOOSE_ONE%.name: Select
%CHOOSE_ONE%.description: Gives the controlling player the ability to choose between two or more effects stated in the card.

%DISABLE%.name: Disable
%DISABLE%.description: Frozen characters lose their next attack.

%ON_PLAY%.name: Warcry
%ON_PLAY%.description: A triggered effect which activates when the card is played from your hand.
